attributes.review: This app is buggy and glitchy and over just horrible. Needs a lot of work. Would give it zero stars if I could

attributes.review: After downloading this app, my house burnt down, my boyfriend dumped me, and I got run over by a semi truck! All within 20 minutes of downloading this app. Coincidence? I think not!
